reviews.review: great addition that ties in all the characters and leaves you wondering what's next for our superheros.
this one is a must see cant wait for the second part...

The culmination of 10 years of Marvel greatness finally coming to a head and leaving you with your jaw open, and just the slightest bit of drool hanging there just about to drop. Yeah, it was great. And you can bet I’ll be on board until Avengers 4...at the LEAST. If you want to know what Star Wars is doing wrong these days, go see this movie and you’ll understand.
Hey star wars..... (Ryan Johnson) This is how you make a truly amazing movie! Take notes
What a great ensemble film - everything it should have been and more. Superb cast linked to each other and some fantastic battle scenes. Bring on the sequel!

The movie that I have waited...........Officially... would be, Guardians 1 time so four years for! AND IT DELIVERS!! Yeah these movies have celebrated 10 years but those of us who don't know what the Infinity Stones are/were then is explained for the first time by the Collector. PS No one remembers Thor :Darkworld. 

Picking up right they left off with Thor Ragnarok, (Black Panther did come out between these films but it sets up Wakanda and it's characters more so than the Infinity stones story) Thanos (Josh Brolin) is seeking out all six Infinity Stones having acquired two stones already he sends his minions to earth to grab the two hidden away there. Tony Stark realizes it is time to stop the nightmares he has been having since New York's Invasion and stop the mad Titan once and for all. 

This movie is something the fans have been waiting for years and it gives most fans what they wanted! Sure their isn't interaction with say Hulk and Spiderman but it is done in a way you understand why and that goes for all characters. 

Josh Brolin as Thanos is one of the Best Villians of all time, Not just Marvel of all time! and that is a huge call to make! The Villian's I think are the best are the ones you understand why they are doing what they are doing and stop and think "they are right" Which is so great to see Marvel take those risks. Thanos could of been the biggest let down of all time having had such a build of being the worst guy around but WOW!!! After having some average to say the least villains in the past people like Michael B Jordan, Micheal Keaton and Cate Blanchette having gone to the great lengths to make them understandable and relatable, Kurt Russell was hit and miss. 

Not going into Spoilers here but the ending is something you sit there and go "I LOVE THIS MOVIE!!! but I feel like I've being punched in the stomach whilst watching it" The stakes are extreme and the emotions run high!! 

HIGHLIGHT in this and their is so many to choose from, is probably The Groot, Rocket and Thor interactions.  

4 1/2
AWESOME! This movie blew me away!!

Lots of action but a has those story flaws that are a little too much for me. For example, I’m supposed to believe that Thor can withstand the energy from a neutron star. Somebody please tell Star Lord he’s a dumb ass for messing up his own plan of attack. Talk trash after you beat the bad guy.
Culmination of 10 years that create and Epic Movie.
